更新Pull Request信息

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"number","in":"path","description":"","required":true,"example":0,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},{"name":"owner","in":"path","description":"","required":true,"example":"","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"repo","in":"path","description":"","required":true,"example":"","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"title":{"type":"string","description":"Pull Request 标题"},"body":{"type":"string","description":"Pull Request 内容"},"state":{"type":"string","description":"Pull Request 状态(closed，open)"},"milestone_number":{"type":"integer","description":"里程碑序号(id)","format":"int32"},"labels":{"type":"string","description":"用逗号分开的标签，名称要求长度在 2-20 之间且非特殊字符。如: bug,performance"},"assignees_number":{"type":"integer","description":"最少审查人数","format":"int32"},"draft":{"type":"boolean","description":"是否设置为草稿"}},"title":"UpdatePullRequestReq"},"example":""}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
